content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STOrder_CY3Month') )
    DROP VIEW dbo.T_STOrder_CY3Month
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[T_STOrder_CY3Month]

AS 

WITH CTE AS (

SELECT lms_parcel_orderid as lms_order_id 
FROM dbo.T_STParcel 
WHERE lms_parcel_pdate >= DATEADD(m,-3, DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE()),0))
AND lms_parcel_pdate <= DATEADD(nanosecond,-50,DATEADD(d,1,CAST(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS DATETIME2(7))))

UNION

SELECT lms_order_id 
FROM dbo.T_STOrder 
WHERE lms_order_hodate >= DATEADD(m,-3, DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE()),0))
AND lms_order_hodate <= DATEADD(nanosecond,-50,DATEADD(d,1,CAST(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS DATETIME2(7))))

)

SELECT 
O.*
FROM CTE 
LEFT JOIN dbo.T_STorder O on O.lms_order_id  = CTE.lms_order_id
